{{cpp/numeric/math/binary_is|islessgreater
|description=Determines if the floating point number {{c|x}} is less than or greater than the floating-point number {{c|y}}, without setting floating-point exceptions.
|condition={{c|x &lt; y {{!!}} x &gt; y}}
|note=
The built-in {{c/core|operator&lt;}} and {{c/core|operator&gt;}} for floating-point numbers may raise {{lc|FE_INVALID}} if one or both of the arguments is NaN. This function is a "quiet" version of the expression {{c|x &lt; y {{!!}} x &gt; y}}.
}}
